purpose: Enable users to create, deploy, and manage autonomous agents across multiple communication platforms
principle: Built on a plugin-based architecture that allows integration with platforms like Discord, Slack, and Telegram, utilizing TypeScript for core functionality
reusability: Highly modular with a plugin system for extending functionality; supports integration with various communication platforms via APIs
limitations: In alpha stage, which may include incomplete features and potential bugs; requires technical setup for plugin development
name: eliza
highlight: Framework for building and orchestrating autonomous agents with plugin support for various platforms
